item.description:
SEE UPDATE RE: RAIN AT THE BOTTOM

New London's Sailfest Mashantucket-Pequot fireworks have been rated the 4th best in the country, and the largest in New England:
http://www.fireworksg...
http://www.associated...

I've heard testimonials from several friends too.

After the fireworks we'll look for something to do in New London while the traffic dies down (midnight?).

There'll be food, vendors, and carnival rides around. Last year there were 4 barges out in the water! This year is supposed to be over 9,000 shells!

We already have a pickup point set in Branford for 6pm (131 North Main St), people can setup additional ones, or just meet in Branford. I'll be passing through New Haven on the way to Branford...though my car's A.C. isn't really working so we'll probably want to leave mine in Branford.

Jason, 203-901-4957 (texting is fine too)

RE: RAIN

As of Sat. noon they've apparently committed to the fireworks tonight, despite the iffy forecast. Earlier today it just said "check at 4pm", now it says: "FIREWORKS WILL TAKE PLACE TONIGHT (Saturday, July 10) AT 9:20pm. FIREWORKS ARE A GO!"
http://www.sailfest.o...

Bring an umbrella/hooded raincoat just in case! And a plastic bag to sit on?

If anything changes, their Twitter and Facebook feeds I assume would tell you.
http://www.sailfest.o...
Or call them (860) 444-1879; (860) 443-3786
item.name: Sat. 7/10 - The 4th best fireworks in the U.S.! New London!
